description: Smallest number a(n) formed from consecutive sequences of digits of PI and satisfying a(n) > a(n-1); first 3 is omitted.
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_. This sequence appeared in the 1973 "Handbook", but was then dropped from the database. Resubmitted by Victor H. Auerbach (vhambler(AT)voicenet.com). Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 11 2012
